api_response.title: Method for optimizing neural network inference using dynamic quantization
api_response.abstract: A method for improving the efficiency of neural network models during inference by applying dynamic quantization techniques. The method includes analyzing activation distributions during runtime and selecting optimal bit-widths for different layers. This results in reduced computational requirements while maintaining model accuracy within acceptable thresholds.
